jetpack-related-posts.title: CMS Connect for WordPress
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: So you want to connect your WordPress site to your Community? Here's how it's done with CMS Connect.

jetpack-related-posts.title: CMS Connect 18 Updates
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: My experience at Connections 18 and updates to CMS Connect for your Lightning Community, learn all about it here!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Yet Another Amazing Idea: Email Alert to Owner’s Manager
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The IdeaExchange is full of amazing ideas. I was creating workflow rules today, and needed to add an Email Alert to inform the owner. As I went about adding the Owner, I thought, "the Owner's Manager should receive the email as well..." and rolled my eyes, dreading the fact that…

jetpack-related-posts.title: These Women Love Salesforce — and Have Tattoos to Prove It
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: In 2017 my Ohana, Lauren Dunn, was visiting Seattle from Ireland, and what else would we do besides get Salesforce Tattoos!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Documentation and User Help
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Greetings Post Readers, I told you I would be back to let you know about Org Documentation and Help Sites so here I am. When it comes to org documentation I have to tell you, mine is either SO BEYOND THROUGH that it would kill many trees to print, OR…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Lightning Ideas Delivered
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Know what I like about Salesforce? Well, one thing I really like.... The fact that they listen, seriously.  Are you using the IdeaExchange?  If not, you need to stop reading now, and go check it out before you read on.  Not only do I like the IdeaExchange so I can…
